name: The Secret of that Village
description:
When Hotaru moves to her aunt's house in the village, she expects a peaceful life with her childhood friends, but is there something lurking in the shadows? Is the seemingly peaceful village hiding it's darkest secrets.

Details:

  • Playtime: 30 - 40mins.
  • Endings: 2.

Characters:

  • Hotaru Watanabe, 17 years old - Protagonist. 
  • Akemi Ito, 17 years old - Cousin and Friend.
  • Sayuri Nakamura , 16 years old - Childhood friend. 
  •  Kanaye Matsuda, 17 years old  – Priest’s daughter. 
  • Matsuda-San, around 50 - Shrine priest.
  • Tsubaki Ito, around 34 - Aunt.
